data.actual_result: The timer disappears until you try to send a message again.
data.expected_result: The slowmode timer should be shown after reloading the client.
data.short_description: Slowmode timer disappears when reloading the client
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel with slowmode being enabled (set it to a bigger time interval to notice the bug) - Make sure you don't have manage channels or manage messages permission - Send a message - Observe the timer that appears now - Reload your client - Observe the timer/slowmode info in the channel again
